seriesStmt.title: František Ignác Antonín Tůma: A thematic catalogue of his works

titlePage.p: MISERERE | a | Canto, Alto, | Tenore, Baſſo | Violino I:mo. | Violino II:do. | Trombone I:mo Oblig. | Trombone II:do. | Organo. | Auth. Dno Thuma. | Chori Gottwicens.

titlePage.p: Miserere | à | 4 Voci | Violino 1mo | Alto viola | e | Tromboni in Conc: | Partes 26 | Del Sg: Francesco Tuma | M: D: C: di S: M:ta C:ca | L’Imp:ce Elisabetta vedova | L’Anno 1743.

annot.p: S solo (8), A solo (7), T solo (8), B solo (7), S coro (6), A coro (6), T coro (5), B coro (5), cnto (4), fag (3), trb 1 (4), trb 2 (4), vl 1 (6), vl 2 (7), vla (2), vlc (6), vlne (8), org (8), maestro di cappella (8)

titlePage.label: [full score, cover]
titlePage.p: Fr. Tůma | 1. Miserere mei Deus | 2. Nunc dimittis servum tuum | 3. In te Domine speravi | Partitura | Fr. Michálek

titlePage.label: [full score, fol. 1r]
titlePage.p: František Tůma | (1704 – 1774) | 1. Miserere mei Deus | 2. Nunc dimittis servum tuum, Domine | 3. In te, Domine, speravi | 4. Fac me tecum | Instrumentivel Fr. Michálek. | (ó 1, 2, 3)

physMedium.p:
full score: 34 x 26 cm, printed staff paper, 14 staves (6 mm)
instrumental parts: 34 x 26 cm, printed staff paper, 12 staves (9 mm)
vocal parts: 26 x 17 cm, printed staff paper, 12 staves (8 mm)

annot.p: The full score comprises four works: fol. 1r, title; fol. 1v–5r (p. 1–8): first movement of Miserere TumW D.3.7; fol. 5v–8v (p. 9–15): Nunc dimittis TumW D.4.4; fol. 9r–15r (p. 16–28): In te, Domine, speravi TumW D.2.12; fol. 15v–17r (p. 29–32): Fac me tecum from Stabat mater TumW F.2; fol. 17v–20v: empty staves.

Parts comprise two works: Miserere TumW D.3.7 (first movement, on first page if there are two) and Nunc dimittis TumW D.4.4 (on second page): S coro (11x; each 2), A coro (8x; each 2), T coro (7x; each 2), B coro (8x; each 2), tr (1), fag (1), trb 1 (1), trb 2 (1), vl 1 (3x; 2, 2, 2), vl 2 (3x; 2, 2, 2), vla (2x; 2, 2), b (3x; 2, 2, 2).
A part for T solo (1) only comprises the Nunc dimittis TumW D.4.4.

titlePage.label: [p. 1]
titlePage.p: Miserere | à | 4 Voci. | Violino Imo | Violino IIdo | Alto Viola | Violoncello | Violone. | Cornetto | Trombone Imo | Trombone IIdo | Fagotto. | Organo. | Basso continuo | Del sg: Francesco Tuma | M. D. C. di S: Mta Cea | L'Impce Elisabetta vedova | L'Anno 1743.

annot.p: from the collection of Otto Schmid
